'''1.21.61''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on February 19, 2025 on most platforms and February 20 for Nintendo Switch, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/34397126341389-Minecraft-1-21-61-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.61 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=February 19, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.61
|;prev
|190308|Player Continues Walking When Opening GUI While Holding Diagonal Direction Buttons
|otherissuescount=5}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue that could cause players to see an error message when attempting to join their Realm.
* Fixed a crash that would occur while loading or creating a project in the editor due to custom blocks accessing material instances before they were loaded.
* Hoglins and zoglins can now be consistently hit by projectiles again.
* Fixed an issue where the lectern would randomly tick and emit a Redstone signal.
